mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID ) t1 where pimdistirbutionid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( ( t1.`FPLX` IS NOT NULL OR t1.`RZKSSJ` IS NOT NULL OR t1.`RZJSSJ` IS NOT NULL OR t1.`RECORD` IS NOT NULL ) )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( ( t1.`FPLX` IS NOT NULL OR t1.`FPZT` IS NOT NULL ) )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`FPLX` IS NOT NULL AND ( t1.`FPZT` = 'YXFP' OR t1.`FPZT` = 'ZTFP' ) )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`EXPERIENCE` = 1 )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`FPLX` = 'ZFP' AND t1.`FPZT` = 'YXFP' AND t11.`YDZT` IS NULL AND t11.`YGZT` = '30' AND t11.RANK IN (select ORMRANKID from T_ORMRANK where ORMRANKNAME < 'D') )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`ISOUTRECORD` = 1 )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`FPLX` = 'CFP' AND t1.`CFPLX` = '10' )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} AND t1.`FPZT` = 'YXFP' )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`FPLX` = 'ZFP' AND t1.`FPZT` = 'YXFP' AND t11.`YDZT` IS NULL AND case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end = '10' AND (t11.RANK NOT IN (select ORMRANKID from T_ORMRANK where ORMRANKNAME < 'D') OR t11.RANK IS NULL) )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`FPLX` = 'ZFP' AND t21.`LGNX` IS NOT NULL )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`FPLX` = 'ZFP' AND t1.`FPZT` = 'YXFP' AND t11.`YDZT` = 'DC' )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`FPZT` = 'YXFP' AND t1.`FPLX` IS NOT NULL )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfselfserviceid} )

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFPLX`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EXPERIENCE`, t1.`FPLX`, t1.`FPZT`, t1.`GZDD`, t1.`GZDQ`, t1.`ISOUTRECORD`, case when FPZT='YXFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调中' when FPZT='ZZFP' and CFPLX='10' then '借调结束' else ' ' end AS `JDZT`, t21.`LGNX`, t1.`LOGCONTENT`, timestampdiff(year,t11.`CSRQ`,sysdate()) AS `NJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t1.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t1.`ORMPOSTID1`, t1.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME` AS `ORMPOSTNAME1`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMWORKHISTORYID`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RECORD`, t1.`RZJSSJ`, t1.`RZKSSJ`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, 20 AS `SSFW`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`XB`, t1.`YBM`, t1.`YBMID`, t31.`SHORTNAME` AS `YBMSHORTNAME`, t1.`YDMXID`, t11.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t11.`YGZT`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`YZZ`, t1.`YZZID`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `YZZZZDZS`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t51.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMDISTIRBUTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t21 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t21.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.YBMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.YZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID1 = t71.ORMPOSTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`FPZT` IS NOT NULL AND t1.`FPLX` IS NOT NULL )
